original_text: After they had fasted for three days, Esther put on her royal clothes. She went to King Xerxes' part of the palace. She stood in the yard outside his rooms. The king was sitting on his royal throne. He could see through the door of the room where he sat.
korean_text: 제삼일에 에스더가 왕후의 예복을 입고 왕궁 안 뜰 곧 어전 맞은편에 서니 왕이 어전에서 전 문을 대하여 왕좌에 앉았다가

sentences.original_text: After they had fasted for three days,
Esther put on her royal clothes.
She went to King Xerxes' part of the palace.
She stood in the yard outside his rooms.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그의 방 밖에 있는 마당에 섰습니다.

sentences.original_text: The king was sitting on his royal throne.
He could see through the door of the room where he sat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 앉아 있던 방의 문을 통해 볼 수 있었습니다.
